General.Name: C&C International Corp.
General.Description: C&C International Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of cosmetics in Korea. The company offers lip glosses, lip sticks, and lip liners; eyeliners, eye shadows, and eyebrows; and face products. It exports its products to Asian countries, such as Thailand, Taiwan, Malaysia, and Japan, as well as Europe, North America, and internationally. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hwaseong, South Korea.
